LOADING.TITLE: Error loading audio files
LOADING.MESSAGE: Couldn't load the audio files from the server. Please try again later.

MISSING_FILES.TITLE: Required information missing
MISSING_FILES.MESSAGE: To play the podcast important references to audio files are missing.

TEXT.BEGINNING: Share text for episode "{title}" with link {link} starting at beginning
TEXT.CHAPTER: Share text for episode "{title}" with link {link} for chapter "{chapter}"
TEXT.PLAYTIME: Share text for episode "{title}" with link {link} beginning at {playtime}

SUBJECT.BEGINNING: Share subject for episode "{title}" with link {link} starting at beginning
SUBJECT.CHAPTER: Share subject for episode "{title}" with link {link} for chapter "{chapter}"
SUBJECT.PLAYTIME: Share subject for episode "{title}" with link {link} beginning at {playtime}

SHOW.TEXT: Share text for show "{title}" with link {link}
SHOW.SUBJECT: Share subject for show "{title}" with link {link}
